import Tax from'../pages/Tax';import Bill from'../pages/Bill';import Login from'../pages/Login';import Error404 from'../components/Error404';//import HeaderOnly from '../components/Layout/HeaderOnly';
var publicRoutes=[];if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'))==="0"||JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'))===null){publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Tax,layout:null},{path:'/login',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}else{publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Tax,layout:null},{path:'/bill',component:Bill,layout:null},{path:'/login',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}var privateRoutes=[];export{publicRoutes,privateRoutes};
